src.UI

Class HUDElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.UI.HUDElement

  • public class HUDElement
extends java.lang.Object
    A text-box that can appear on the screen at any location with a given colour, location and text.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • HUDElement

        public HUDElement()
        Default constructor

      • HUDElement

        public HUDElement(HUDElement parent,
                  HUDElement.REFERENCE reference,
                  int xOffset,
                  int yOffset,
                  int blockWidth,
                  int blockHeight,
                  org.newdawn.slick.Color backgroundColor,
                  java.lang.String textDisplay,
                  org.newdawn.slick.Color textColor)
        Initialise a new HUDElement object with a given size, location, text and colour
        Parameters:
        parent - The HUDElement that this one should align itself with
        reference - The reference point of the parent to use to align this object
        xOffset - The x-offset from the reference point
        yOffset - The y-offset from the reference point
        blockWidth - The width of the block on the screen
        blockHeight - The height of the block on the screen
        backgroundColor - The background colour of the text box
        textDisplay - The line of text to be displayed on the text box
        textColor - The colour of the text to be displayed

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Get the current text being displayed on the text box
        Returns:
        A line of text containing everything being displayed

      • setVisible

        Set whether or not this HUDElement should be displayed on the screen
        Parameters:

      • lockDisplay

        public void lockDisplay(int time)
        Lock the HUDElement so that no changes in text displayed or visibility can be made for a given amount of time
        Parameters:
        time - The time in milliseconds to lock the display

      • locked

        public boolean locked()
        Get whether or not the HUDElement is currently locked

        Whether or not the HUDElement is currently locked
